_meanings:
{@--5@} To be or
remain near, stay with.

{@--6@} To go
to with the desire of getting (<ab>P.</ab> or
A.); {#praBumupatizWati-te#} <ls>Sk.</ls>

{@--8@} To meet, join (as a river) (<ab>A.</ab>);
{#gaMgA yamunAmupatizWate#} <ls>Sk.</ls>

{@--10@} To approach
with hostile intentions.

{@--15@} To stand under for
support.

{@--16@} To resort to;  
{#veSamupatizWaMti#} <ls>Dk. 60.</ls>
{@--17@} To conciliate.
{@--2@} To place upon or near.

{@--3@}
To produce.
